ED_Title: Report of the Secretary-General on the work of the Organization
ED_DecisionText:
At its 28th plenary meeting, on 3 October 2017, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Secretary-General on the work of the Organization.

(See A/72/1; A/72/PV.28)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
